title: Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow removal
OB: When performing the 'Update Test Suite' action, it is not clear that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in 'X' being removed.
EB: The 'Update Test Suite' action should clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will remove 'X' from the test suite.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Start the 'Update Test Suite' action. 2. Select 'Y' in the dialog. 3. Observe that 'X' is removed from the test suite.
